name: Wackages
description:
Overworked. Understaffed.  And now the conveyer's gone haywire, too.  What do you do to keep the order in the warehouse?  Make use of those karate skills you've been practicing in the shower, of course!  Jump, dash, and kick as many parcels into the shelves as you can before the fences close.

Controls:
  • Move: WASD
  • Look: Mouse
  • Jump: Space
  • Kick: Left Mouse Button  (In the direction you are looking in)
  • Dash (While aired): E
  • Stomp (While aired): Left Control
Hint(s):
  • When the bars start to rise make sure to aim to the top while kicking the packages to make them go higher!
